data.snippet:
CYNIC Judge Orchestrator — Full 7-Step Cycle.
Orchestrates: PERCEIVE→JUDGE→DECIDE→ACT→LEARN→ACCOUNT→EMERGE.
Consciousness levels: L3 REFLEX (non-LLM Dogs only), L2 MICRO (voting Dogs), L1 MACRO (full 7-step), L4 META (full + evolution).
Uses PBFT consensus, phi-bounded scoring, EWC learning, Thompson sampling.
MAX_PARALLEL_DOGS = 11. CircuitBreaker wired. ScholarDog.learn() called in LEARN step.

context: Review orchestrator.py — 7-step cycle structure, PBFT consensus, EWC wiring. Is it sound?
